mapper.select:
select
from tb_memberlabel where id=#{id} and del_flag=0

select
from tb_memberlabel where del_flag=0 AND remarks IS null ORDER BY create_date DESC

select
from tb_memberlabel where del_flag=0 AND remarks IS NOT null ORDER BY remarks DESC

select
from tb_memberlabel where del_flag=0 ORDER BY remarks DESC,create_date DESC

from tb_memberlabel where labelname=#{labelName} and del_flag=0
